title: Phonegap app for uzlist.com
description:
Mobile app developed with Phonegap technology. 95% of Javascript functionality is based on Angularjs. App utilizes API at api.uzlist.com.

CRUD functions are handled in Angular controllers. App has many custom directives, and utilizes image lazy loading in number of places. Contents are dynamicly loaded from the server as user scrolls to the buttom of the page

App fuctionalities include:

  • Browsing ads in different categories
  • User authentication
  • Image lazy loading in number of places
  • Content infinite loading
  • HTML5 localstorage utilization
